description.en:
MonetaryUnit (MUE) is a fork of Quark. There will be a total of 1 Quadrillion coins (i.e. 1,000,000,000,000,000 MUE). There is a 40,000,000 MUE pre-mine (0.000004% of total supply) to fund faucet, giveaways, promotions and development of which 9,0000,000 MUE has already been given away or used for development. 

The release of MonetaryUnit is staggered into 10 different stages. Each “stage” lasts about 18.5 days, and is made up of 40,000 “blocks”. Each block is released every 40 seconds, and a block is the reward for mining the MonetaryUnit network. The block reward changes at every stage, so that the number of coins released per day will change every 18.5 days up until stage 10. At stage 10, the number of coins released per day will always be 86,500 coins per day, or 40 MUE per block. 

MUE is a coin that has a fair launch with a block reward schedule that increases as time goes on. Here is the block reward schedule:
0.025 MUE reward for first 40,000 blocks (54 MUE/day)
1 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (2160 MUE/day)
2 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (4320 MUE/day)
4 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (8640 MUE/day)
8 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (17280 MUE/day)
10 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (21600 MUE/day)
20 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (43200 MUE/day)
30 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (64800 MUE/day)
40 MUE reward thereafter (86400 MUE/day)

1 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (2160 MUE/day)
2 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (4320 MUE/day)
4 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (8640 MUE/day)
8 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (17280 MUE/day)
10 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (21600 MUE/day)
20 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (43200 MUE/day)
30 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (64800 MUE/day)
40 MUE reward thereafter (86400 MUE/day)
description.id:
MonetaryUnit (MUE) is a fork of Quark. There will be a total of 1 Quadrillion coins (i.e. 1,000,000,000,000,000 MUE). There is a 40,000,000 MUE pre-mine (0.000004% of total supply) to fund faucet, giveaways, promotions and development of which 9,0000,000 MUE has already been given away or used for development. 

The release of MonetaryUnit is staggered into 10 different stages. Each “stage” lasts about 18.5 days, and is made up of 40,000 “blocks”. Each block is released every 40 seconds, and a block is the reward for mining the MonetaryUnit network. The block reward changes at every stage, so that the number of coins released per day will change every 18.5 days up until stage 10. At stage 10, the number of coins released per day will always be 86,500 coins per day, or 40 MUE per block. 

MUE is a coin that has a fair launch with a block reward schedule that increases as time goes on. Here is the block reward schedule:
0.025 MUE reward for first 40,000 blocks (54 MUE/day)
1 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (2160 MUE/day)
2 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (4320 MUE/day)
4 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (8640 MUE/day)
8 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (17280 MUE/day)
10 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (21600 MUE/day)
20 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (43200 MUE/day)
30 MUE reward for next 40,000 blocks (64800 MUE/day)
40 MUE reward thereafter (86400 MUE/day)

Buy $MUE #anonymously and without registration
with $BTC $ETH $LTC $BCH $XRP

You can also SELL your $MUE to $BTC anonymously :)
Just visit CoinBuy.io/
(A team MUE project)

We are excited to announce the launch of "Flubit Points".

Flubit Points are the world's first MUE blockchain powered loyalty points program.

https://flubit.com/blog/flubit-points-revolution-blockchaincrypto-space

FUNDING ANNOUNCEMENT
As many will know over the past few months we've been looking to raise initial money for BEST (Blockchain Ecommerce Solutions and Technology).

We're extremely excited to announce our Seed funding round has closed OVER funded!

We're already in talks to close our larger Series A round to provide further marketing and outreach for MUE products. 

More details available at https://www.MonetaryUnit.com/support-mue

Thank you for all the support.

If you are interested in obtaining equity in the world's largest crypto enabled marketplace then we'd like to talk to you!

Flubit.com was acquired by MonetaryUnit in summer 2018, with the aim to help with mass adoption of cryptocurrency.
Since then we have done huge amounts of work to make the journey for non-crypto shoppers into MUE as simple as possible (with even more work ongoing).

If you'd like to help support us then please read on https://www.MonetaryUnit.com/support-mue

Registered users can now buy $MUE with credit/debit card without ID verification here: https://flubit.com/get-mue
Get MUE, Get 25% off all prices at Flubit.com
